Container.Name: LMS
Container.Overview:
DESCRIPTION LMS (Lightweight Music Server) is a self-hosted music streaming software: access your music collection from anywhere using a web interface!
Live demo: http://lms-demo.poupon.dev/ The administration panel is not available in the live demo.
NOTES • Run the following cmds before building the container: 'mkdir -m 777 -p /mnt/user/appdata/lms/config' and 'curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/SmartPhoneLover/unraid-docker-templates/main/templates/dependencies/lms/lms.conf --output /mnt/user/appdata/lms/config/lms.conf'.
VERSION 1.0 (2022-02-09)

Config.Name: Storage (data)
Config.Description: This is the location for the internal data.

Config.Name: Storage (media)
Config.Description: This is the location for you media library.
